sources.title: Strange Marriage
sources.description: “”More than slightly worthwhile” “Charming start, but looses its way” (IMDB reviews quotes). A unique pre-code romantic comedy that takes unusual twists and turns. Evalyn Knapp and Walter Byron costar at the head of a large, accomplished cast. Check it out. This one really is different. IMDB rating 6.6. Directed by Richard Thorpe. Released in 1932. Complete print. A. K.A. “Slightly Married”
